Game

Class AGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.AGame
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Game

    public abstract class AGame
extends java.lang.Object
    This class create an abstract Game to decouple the code and load an other game if we want to change the game
    Author:
    Stevosh
